name: Tank Brawl 2
detailed_description:
Tank Brawl 2 is currently in development and will be released around late 2018. We want to build a game that will wow player every 5 minutes so that by the time you finish the game, your wow counter of epic moments would not be less than 100. This will be the best shoot-up tank game of this generation which would be be remembered 30 years from now as THE ONE with many original mechanics that inspired dozens other games.



A few examples of these moments are:
  • Enemy can launch a rocket to ward your game camera and make your screen goes black for a few seconds.
  • Enemies will congrats their friend who killed you and gather to see your corpse.
  • You can choose to buy or rob a shop ( the later will require you to fight police force to escape )
  • Some enemy is aware that they are in a game where player have save game and will take advantage of that.
  • Some enemy pretend to be the tutorial guy to kill you.

Steam Community Discussions


Tell us the features you want in steam community and we will try to do them and have your name in the credit section.

Below are the list features that we are PLANNING TO have:

Free 3 vs 3 Team multiplayer battle.

Combine vehicle and driver classes to make hundred different playable classes (Inspired by Titan Quest class system).

Drive Jeeps, Tanks, Giant Mechs or the brutal Mobile Rocket Launchers. Each with its own unique game-play mechanics.

A campaign with 100 wow moments, we will provide an in game counter of these moments to prove our promise.


- Most impressive and satisfying tank destruction ever.
- Most impressive and satisfying shooting visual ever.
- And more features yet to be revealed.

short_description: An shoot-up tank game with vehicle/driver class combination system inspired by Final Fantasy and Titan Quest. Drive jeeps, tanks, giant mechs, mobile rocket launcher in 3v3 Multiplayer and a campaign with 100 wows moment. It will be the best armor shooter ever.
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at lease 1 GB Memory
